compatibility.notes: CECIIL-1.1 allows for linking with non-copyleft licenses, but any modifications to the CECILL-1.1 licensed code must remain under the same license.

key_requirements: Ensure compliance with French law regarding intellectual property.
Provide limited warranty and liability disclaimers.
Encourage users to test the software for suitability.
license.name: CECILL-1.1
obligations: Users must disclose the source code when redistributing modified versions.
Users must include the original license text in redistributions.
Users must include copyright notices in redistributions.
Users must state changes made to the original software.
Redistributions must be under the same license.
